name: Last Resort (fuzzywobs)
description:
This game was made to be a super quick game which is all just one big pun of the theme "Last Resort" it should take less than 60 seconds to complete!

There is one tutorial level, and three "levels".

Use your left click and hold to slice the items in the specified way in order to move to the next level. Press escape to quit, and R to restart from the start.

Audio is key in this game. The entire  programming was done within one single (massive!) FSM. Which isn't necessarily the best or most efficient way to do it, I just thought I would try and see if I could keep it all contained within 1 FSM!
